knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

## Cleaning Data

Import Data 
```{r}
playstore <- read.csv('googleplaystore.csv', header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

```
Summary of initial data

```{r,echo=FALSE}
summary(playstore)
```
Remove NA values

```{r}
playstore <- na.omit(playstore)
summary(playstore)
```
App ratings should have a maximum value of 5

```{r}
playstore = subset(playstore[playstore$Rating <= 5,])
summary(playstore)
str(playstore)
```
